familyControlsEnabled.description: Required. Set to true to use time limits.

PayloadOrganization.description: This value describes the issuing organization of the profile, as displayed to the user

PayloadIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the payload, dot-delimited.  Usually root PayloadIdentifier+subidentifier

PayloadType.description: The type of the payload, a reverse dns string

PayloadVersion.description: The version of the whole configuration profile.

limits-list.description: Required if familyControlsEnabled is true. Time limits settings.

start.description: Optional. Curfew start time in the format %d:%d:%d.

end.description: Optional. Curfew end time in the format %d:%d:%d.

enabled.description: Required. Set to true to enable these settings.

rangeType.description: Required. Type of day range: 0 = weekday, 1 = weekend.

secondsPerDay.description: Optional. Seconds for that day for allowance.
